name: NewsChannel10
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from NewsChannel 10 Amarillo, Texas within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Amarillo, Texas area from the NewsChannel 10 Weather team.
